short.am,ar,bn,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_US,es_419,fa,: Play Monkey Mart - Fun Game as a Chrome extension - Also can Play without Internet, try it now!

short.ca: Juga a Monkey Mart - Joc Divertit com a extensió de Chrome - També pots jugar sense connexió a Internet, prova-ho ara!

short.da: Spil Monkey Mart - Sjovt spil som en Chrome-udvidelse - Kan også spilles uden internet, prøv det nu!
short.de,et: Jouez à Monkey Mart - Fun Game en tant qu'extension Chrome - Vous pouvez également y jouer sans Internet, essayez-le maintenant !

short.fil: I-play ang Monkey Mart - Isang Nakakatuwang Laro bilang isang Chrome extension - Maaari rin na Laruin kahit walang Internet,…

short.ja: Chrome拡張機能として遊べる楽しいゲーム、モンキーマートをプレイしましょう！インターネットに接続していなくてもプレイすることができます。今すぐ試してみてください！
short.ko: 크롬 확장 프로그램으로 즐기는 신나는 몽키 마트 게임입니다 - 인터넷없이도 플레이할 수도 있습니다. 지금 바로 시도해보세요!
short.lt: Žaiskite "Monkey Mart" - įdomią žaidimą kaip "Chrome" plėtinį - Taip pat galite žaisti be interneto, išbandykite dabar!

short.ro: Jucați Monkey Mart - joc distractiv ca o extensie Chrome - De asemenea, puteți juca fără internet, încercați acum!
short.ru: Играйте в игру "Обезьянка Март" - увлекательную игру в виде расширения для Chrome - можете играть и без интернета, попробуйте…

short.sv: Spela Monkey Mart - Rolig spel som en Chrome-tillägg - Kan även spelas utan internet, prova det nu!
short.th: เล่น Monkey Mart - เกมสนุกเป็นส่วนเสริมของ Chrome - สามารถเล่นได้โดยไม่ต้องเชื่อมต่ออินเทอร์เน็ตเช่นกัน ลองเล่นเดี๋ยวนี้!

short.vi: Chơi Monkey Mart - Trò chơi vui nhộn như một tiện ích Chrome - Cũng có thể chơi mà không cần kết nối internet, thử ngay bây giờ!
short.zh_CN: 在Chrome扩展上玩猴子超市-有趣的游戏-还可以离线玩，现在试试吧！
short.zh_TW: 玩《Monkey Mart－有趣遊戲》這款Chrome擴充功能- 也可以在沒有網路的情況下玩，現在試試看吧！

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Welcome to Monkey Mart, a captivating simulation game that lets players step into the shoes of a supermarket manager, overseeing a lively store operated entirely by monkeys! 🐒🛒 This game seamlessly blends strategy and time management, challenging players to run their store efficiently, manage inventory, and cater to customers to boost profits and grow their business. Monkey Mart's quirky theme, combined with the intricacies of management, ensures an entertaining experience for simulation and strategy game enthusiasts.

How to Dive In:
Take charge as the manager in Monkey Mart, where you lead a team of industrious monkeys handling various supermarket responsibilities. Your goal is to keep shelves stocked with diverse products, meet customer demands, and generate revenue to unlock upgrades for store expansion. Balancing resource allocation, time management, and store layout is key to maximizing efficiency and profits.

🐵🛒 Ready to embark on a wild supermarket adventure? Manage your monkey team, keep those shelves brimming, and let the profits soar in Monkey Mart! 🌟

Play more games and explore exciting themes in the top-left menu.
